    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardPanel

        public BoardPanel(int x,
                  int y,
                  boolean isEnemy,
                  javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> handler)
        GridPanel is used to manage cells of the board.
        Parameters:
        x: - x of the left-upper corner coordinate
        y: - y of the left-upper corner coordinate
        isEnemy: - true if the board is for enemy.
        handler: - event handler called when click one cell.

      • buildShipMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<CellEntry>> buildShipMap()
        The function is called after the user clicks the start game button. It shall get all indexes of ships and corresponding cells, then build a hashmap.
        Returns:
        ShipCellMap that checks the cell map of ship.
